website_summaries.verdict: This porcelain tea set good for older children. It comes with a beautiful carry basket to hold all the pieces.
pros: No lead in the paint or pots
The size is perfect for doll tea parties
Comes in a cute basket for storage
Small children can handle this set well
cons: Ceramic pieces have to be purchased as a set and cannot be easily replaced if broken

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t usable... it’s plugged. :(
customer_reviews.text: I was soo excited to give this to my daughter for her birthday! She has been wanting a tea/picnic set for over two years... I finally have a day off work so she was able to have a little party... when she tried using her set and it doesn’t work. :( the tea kettle is blocked. Hoping that someone reaches out to help fix this issue. Besides that it’s an absolutely adorable tea set and my kids absolutely adore it, she’s just sad she can’t have a real tea party.
customer_reviews.author: Krystin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our four year old daughter because she loves ladybugs and tea parties and this is the cutest tea set. It comes with just the right amount of stuff and fits back into the basket nicely, no need to jam things in. It is also very durable as she has dropped a few items a few times and nothing has broken yet. The only reason I gave it four stars is because while the basket is so cute it becomes lopsided due to the fact that it only has one handle and not two. I would definitely recommend this product to a friend though and fellow tea lover.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: the lady bug tea set is great. the spoons come out of the pocket and ...
customer_reviews.text: the lady bug tea set is great. the spoons come out of the pocket and the tea pot top comes of so you can put a drink in it, so does the suger bowl and it comes in a basket so you can put your tea set. the basket has velcro to put your tea set.
customer_reviews.author: olivia I

customer_reviews.title: Very tiny cups
customer_reviews.text: Product was a lot smaller than i expected. Picture shows little napkins in the cups. This is not possible with these miniature cups. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: shellc623

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Cute little tea-set we got it for our two little girls. Already had to send for a replacement. Two of the spoons came broken then two of the cups broke a couple of days later. Very cheap, so far the second set has held up. Won't be purchasing anything other than plastic going forward.
customer_reviews.author: BB8

customer_reviews.title: Great tea set except for the handle on the wicker basket.
customer_reviews.text: I like eveything about it except the handle of the wicker basket. There's only one handle, in the center, and you can't carry it without things shifting inside. That said, my granddaughter loves her tea set and has had a few tea parties with her brothers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Guinnee

customer_reviews.title: The reason we didn't like it was b/c we thought it was a bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have returned it if the shipping wasn't so expensive. The reason we didn't like it was b/c we thought it was a bigger basket, and tea set. The actual cups and pots are super tiny! We thought it was like another set we has saw at a store and were very disappointed when we received this. Over-priced!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very cute set but TEENSY
customer_reviews.text: The set is very charming and I like that it's ceramic but it is absolutely teeny tiny. Just keep that in mind. Otherwise would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jean S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this is a "mini" tea set! It is not big by any means, but is beautiful. Perfect for tiny tea parties. The basket is lovely and the little glass dishes were packed nicely in plastic which held them in place through shipping. There was a small delay in shipping, which I was informed of immediately. But we had plenty of time, so I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri White

customer_reviews.title: Size is misleading
customer_reviews.text: The size is misleading. This set is better for for an American girl doll, not a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Bradly A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute set/basket had some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Cute ladybug tea set. As other reviewers have stated, the items are very small and being ceramic, they are somewhat delicate but it's still is a good pretend play tea set. My main problem is with the basket. The plastic "fishing line" used to attach the fabric lining had to be redone on one of the lid flaps. There was also a metal wire (used to create the basket lid hinge) sticking up past the basket lining which could possibly pose an injury. I was able to fix it with pliers but wanted to make buyers aware of this potential problem.
customer_reviews.author: Happymom

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughters love this! The little basket makes it so easy for them to carry and makes it even more fun for them. A great addition to their new playhouse!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary McKay

customer_reviews.title: Tea set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set I bought for as a gift they loved the set . I like that it can be put away in its own little basket. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to give this to my granddaughter for her 4th ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke day 1! I was so happy to give this to my granddaughter for her 4th birthday and it came in a TINY basket, with only one handle (which will never work for walking around as it will never be the same weight on both sides). The handles were made so poorly, although it was a cute set...DON'T BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: ... friend's daughter for her second birthday and couldn't be happier. The set was great - super cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend's daughter for her second birthday and couldn't be happier. The set was great - super cute, and very nice quality. Actual stoneware, instead of plastic. Definitely something she'll use time and time again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old coveted this set!!! Unfortunately her 1 yr old brother broke a few pieces so I’ll be buying a 2nd set!
customer_reviews.author: Val (Bubbles)

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: It is really cute, and the little girl I bought it for loved it but one of the plates was chipped. It was well packed, so must have been put in the box already broken. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately my daughter didn't seem to care
customer_reviews.text: Every single one of the spoons broke within one day. They were poorly glued together, and broke with very little effort. Fortunately my daughter didn't seem to care, but it easily could have made her very sad that her new tea set broke the first time she used it. Also, the pieces are VERY VERY SMALL. This is more a tea set for dolls that it is children.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd G. Devious

customer_reviews.title: No email for product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son love this set. My mother got it for them because she has one and they play with it all the time. The set just came and the spoons and spoon holder are missing. There is no product email listed. We do not want to return whole set we would just like that part sent to us if possible?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just purchased for a gift
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. I can already tell its going to be very small. basket looks big in picture. BUT my 8 year old niece will love it:)
customer_reviews.author: michelle r

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Grand Daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute tea set!! My Grand Daughter Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: sally p wallace

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this tea set, the quality is amazing. We purchased it for our 1.5 year old daughter. She loves tea sets. It is meant for older kids, but we removed a few of the smaller pieces in the set. She does not even know they are missing. This set is breakable, and she did drop one of the cups on a hard floor(it broke in half). This is a toy you definitely have to watch a kid use if they don't understand how to be gentle.
customer_reviews.author: slingshot3000

customer_reviews.title: The cups are adorable. It's very reminiscent of the tea set that ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for a friend's 2 year old daughter (but really for the mother and because it was cute). The mother loves it. The cups are adorable. It's very reminiscent of the tea set that my mother has from when she was a little girl. I imagine this these will be held onto for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JMinton

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute! She loves it. It even comes with a table cloth for tea time!
customer_reviews.author: SlDT

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the new wish. Last few products I’ve purchased through here have been complete trash.
customer_reviews.text: Hated this set. So tiny. I bought this as a gift for my daughter and it looks like it’s going to break into pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Highly tRecommended
customer_reviews.text: Adorable product. Careful of youngest child as the parts are smaller. Basket really makes this special.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL FOR TODDLERS
customer_reviews.text: Can not put 1 ounce of fluids in the cups; too small Set is pretty but would have never ordered it if I knew the contents were so miniature
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Hightower

customer_reviews.title: My 5- Year old granddaughter seemed to like it. Just wish the items were a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea for complete tea set. My 5- Year old granddaughter seemed to like it. Just wish the items were a little bigger. I would be willing to pay more for a larger set. This set is more doll-sized. I can't imagine the smaller sized set is even usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids immediately set it up with water and had a special tea party all for themselves, adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mutton

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete set
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty small, but we anticipated that. The problem was that it showed up with one plate missing which left one 6 year old pretty sad on Christmas Day.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are adoreable and my granddaughter loves to have many tea parties all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute but overprised.
customer_reviews.text: :) Your paying for the basket. GO to ross. Same product different packaging.
customer_reviews.author: RayaSunshine

customer_reviews.title: my daughter should still love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and has lots of pieces but it's tiny. much smaller than expected it's the size of a lunch box roughly. my daughter should still love it.
customer_reviews.author: shyne

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy basket with sturdy velcro closure. Tea set is adorable! Using with Fancy Nancy book for gift.
customer_reviews.author: Snappinpix

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very small but very cute. Seams to be well made and my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very Tiny Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: This is definatly a miniture teas set. The silver wear is smaller then my first finger. If ym kids would play with this set I am sure it would brake the fisrt time they would use it. This set is half the size for normal play tea sets. There are some red stains on the set as thou some one touched it when they where not suppose to it will not come off. [...].
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Very cute & sweet tea set
customer_reviews.text: The dishes and cups are real ceramic. The medal portion of most of the forks and spoons came apart from their ceramic base within a couple of days, but were easily repaired with a bit of glue.
customer_reviews.author: jsmorel

customer_reviews.title: Great things come in small packages
customer_reviews.text: Mulch smaller than I imagined. As in could fit in a small brown lunch bag. Despite size it was a great gift and was loved!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great way to teach equitte to a small child
customer_reviews.text: I use this tea set to teach my child how to act at the table, when and how to use the knife and forks, saucers etc. I don't like that is very easy to break, the set should of being made out of more durable material, but other than that I love it and she loves it. We can't stop having tea party and picinic.
customer_reviews.author: Avet

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set but small in size.
customer_reviews.text: The tea set was minature in size. I thought it would be bigger and I was a little disappointed but my 5 year old niece absolutely loves it. I guess imaginary friends are not picky and it's the perfect size for your dolls and stuff animals. If she's happy I am.
customer_reviews.author: Rurbm

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Materials are nice, very well made, a bit small but it was perfect for my 4 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Cuevas Imery

customer_reviews.title: Small - the Size of a shoebox
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should read the description better, but this was much smaller than I expected. its about the size of a shoebox. Other than that, excellent quality. Real china-ish cups and saucers.
customer_reviews.author: Madsmom

customer_reviews.title: Where's the rest of it?
customer_reviews.text: I should have heeded the warnings that this was a tiny set. It was made for dolls not kids. I think Vector shrunk it....returning.
customer_reviews.author: AbsMom

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 4 year old granddaughters and they absolutely love it. I would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old granddaughters and they absolutely love it. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We enjoy having tea parties
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute little tea set. We enjoy having tea parties.
customer_reviews.author: J. reb :)

customer_reviews.title: Someone make this set a little bigger!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and adorable! I would love more it if it was scaled up to double size! Mostly this is to pretend with dolls! Minus one star for size!
customer_reviews.author: Cory DeNuccio

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not great, smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than you think and fragile. Hard to play with when you have to be very careful. It does comes in a cute basket and cute ladybug design.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tea set for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tea set for my daughter, she loves it. It will break if they are not careful, but that's why she loves it. It looks fancy and she was ready to step up from plastic.
customer_reviews.author: rdsteve23

customer_reviews.title: Bought for granchild. She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a three year old grandchild. Wanted a special tea set for her. She loves it! Mom says babygirl drags it out every morning. For the smile on babygirl's face, it's worth it. Shipped fast, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeandf

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves her tea set. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the basket and tea set too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Cammack

customer_reviews.title: For Litrle Girls
customer_reviews.text: Small and perfect for my 4yr old granddaughter. Just enough for her to keep up with. Love the napkins!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Grace

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller in person than it appears online, but still cute for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bendle-Hamby

customer_reviews.title: Cute but fragile
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a replacement for the same set without a basket. The first set lasted about a week before a couple of pieces broke. My 3-year-old loves her ladybug tea set, although it is extremely fragile. She has learned to be more careful with it, but our next tea set will be of a more durable material. The basket is cute but does nothing to protect the tea set.
customer_reviews.author: PMomof2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set is so cute for my little one. She loves that it comes in the basket too1
customer_reviews.author: Katrine L. Rust

customer_reviews.title: ... Christmas gift for one of my nieces and she loved it. It wasn't as fragile as I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a Christmas gift for one of my nieces and she loved it. It wasn't as fragile as I thought which was great. The basket that came with it helps to keep it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Tyszkiewicz Nesbit

customer_reviews.title: Great Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: One of my daughters loves lady bugs and loves this set. My wife ordered it and I did not realize that this is a breakable set. My daughters are only 4 and play with this set on a regular basis -- nothing broke to date. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: WebAdventures

customer_reviews.title: holidaygifts
customer_reviews.text: This was an adorable set. Sized for a child to use with other children or with dolls. It was a gift and have not received a response about how she liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one day!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful tea set and my 4 year daughter loves it! But unfortunately it broke just the next day. It is made very fragile and the handle to the basket popped right out. It isn't woven into the basket, which how it should have been made, rather it is glued to the side of the basket which now let loose!. We are attempting to fix it. I would like to send it back honestly, but my daughter still enjoys it, not really caring too much about the broken handle. She just keeps telling me "Daddy, you will fix it?" :-(((
customer_reviews.author: E. Lemes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVED this tea set. We have used it many times.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Little Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, nieces, and I all love this tea set. Very dainty. Cute little ladybugs. Made in China. Not for sure if they're made out of porcelain or not, but it is some kind of breakable substance. We're very careful with ours. The educational value is that it teaches your child how to share. The little picnic basket is a great storage container for everything. They are small pieces, but a great product. Would strongly recommend if you're looking for a child's tea set keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: jcworrell

customer_reviews.title: Adorable MINIATURE tea set
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable tea set BUT it's a MINIATURE tea set. The cups will hold ONE sip of liquid so don't expect to actually be drinking tea from these. My 5 yr old still loves it and will fill them with water and have pretend tea parties. The basket is not an actual straw basket but is weaved with some kind of plastic (sorta similar to a plastic resin wicker patio set one would find in the lawn & garden section), but is super cute and durable and will hold all items inside. Overall good buy, but just keep in mind the size of this set otherwise you will be disappointed when you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaT

customer_reviews.title: Nice tea set, good price, a bit fragile
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tea set as a birthday gift for our 5 year old, she recently gave her Fisher price one to a younger cousin & this was just the right set for the next age. She especially liked that it was complete with little spoons, sugar & creamer & linens. It was the best value for that reason. It would be nice if the basket had some sort of protective storage as the pieces are fragile - Mom's going to have to get creative for that. I'd also suggest an additional pattern choice or two. This a really cute set & includes everything you need to host a proper tea party.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-Um

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed when I received it
customer_reviews.text: This is a doll size tea set. It is impractical to have a tea party with it. Very disappointed when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old requested this from Santa. We ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old requested this from Santa. We were impressed with the quality. Came complete with a cute wicker basket with silverware and napkins.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gregory

customer_reviews.title: ladybug tea set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 5 year old who loves picnics and tea parties. Its very cute however was very disappointed at the size of the tea set
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how small the basket actually was. Luckily I bought this for my 2 year old cousin so it is a good size for her. I wish that there were two handles to the basket because one just didn't feel right. Its a cute product. Good for small children who are gentle with items (as to not break the set and step on it). For older children this could be used as a tea set when playing with larger dolls.
customer_reviews.author: calledbyname

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very cute tea set. But didn’t realize how small the set would be.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Check size before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this tea set. It was so tiny. Next time I will check the dimensions before ordering, but for now I will go buy one that a child can actually play with.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Brown

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loved her tea set
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loved her tea set! now I just need to teach her how to be a little gentle as it is ceramic!

customer_reviews.title: arrived
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was so surprised. She really loves it. Her sister was so jealous. I thought they were on the small side.

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than I expected

customer_reviews.author: Kris Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 year olds picnics with her dolls. The detail is very nice. I would highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tea set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tea set. I didn't see that it was porcelain since it was bought for my 3yr olds birthday but we just make sure there is parent supervision when being used

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for my 5 yr old Grand daughter

customer_reviews.title: Plastic basket!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, it is adorable. My doughter was so happy about napkins and spoons! but the very basket is plastic and very loose( it seems to break very soon. And it's more fragile then other ceramic tea set which we've bought in London. one cup has a sliver already.
customer_reviews.author: Marusya Vasyanova

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set for little girls that like to have a tea party with their dolls. The set is very small, but my granddaughter loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Tea set
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery, new condition, thought it was very small for the price, got it for my granddaughter, because that is what she wanted for chrfistmas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set. I think it would be a better ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. I think it would be a better price if it was$ 19.99. Compared to what else is out there it wasnt a horrible price.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon&Marlee Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Not-durable and Tiny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tea set for my niece and was disappointed by the size. It was a lot smaller than i thought, it's more of a miniature tea set which is fragile. One of the handles of from the cups, broke off right after use. This is definitely not a very usable or sturdy tea set.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Everything was packed good. Nothing was broken
customer_reviews.text: Everything was packed good. Nothing was broken. It is the cutest thing to have tea parties with your little girl

customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted a 'real' tea set for Christmas and has fallen in love with this one I gave her.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is as cute as the pictures, my niece loves it! She is almost 3 and has played with it everyday since Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the tea set.Would definitely buy it again.However the cups could be a little bigger. It is hard for grandma and grandpa to hold the cups when they have to attend the tea parties.

customer_reviews.title: A real hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 11 year old granddaughter for her birthday & she absolutely loves it!!

customer_reviews.author: carolyn daly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is very delicate and just perfect for a little girls tea party. My daughter is 7, and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grand daughter was delighted with her tea set. She is very careful with it and now we have regular tea parties.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: It has made a great tea set for my daughter's 4th birthday. I only wish that it included some sort of pockets or durable storage container for all of the pieces. We simply kept the original packaging to keep the set protected.
customer_reviews.author: ojkuzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So tiny, but exactly what my daughter wanted. She's thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Falky

customer_reviews.title: Great fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My 9th year old daughter loves her tea set! It is a little smaller than I expected but she does not mind. The whole set came in a nice basket and therefore it is convenient that everything can be put back inside the basket.
customer_reviews.author: C. Loose

customer_reviews.title: Cute as a bug
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tea set. It has plenty of pieces for young ones to imagine with and it feels like playing with real china and fancy flatware. The pieces are chunky making them less breakable in young hands. Having a storage basket for the set is nice although the handle on our basket is loose and needs to be attached better before it comes off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Sized more for dolls than children. DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: No near the size the "picnic basket" look leads you to believe. It says for 8+ years old. Seems more like a tea set for dolls than for kids. Would NOT BUY it again and would NOT RECOMMEND it to anyone. I just received shipment today and am requesting return information today. That's how disappointing this product is.
customer_reviews.author: S D Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Cute Set
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with the contents and quality of this tea set. My 5 year old set has loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: small, but cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, who is 5, likes this set a lot. The basket is great, allowing for lots of pretend picnic tea parties. My only complaint, besides the size, which is not OVERLY tiny, but would have been nice if it were a little bigger, was the SMELL. The set smelled like it had been in a moist, musty, attic for a decade. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Jess G.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES this tea set.
customer_reviews.text: She loves the miniature cups and silverware and the basket to go with--the cups and saucers will break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set is super small and super cute. I know my daughter will love it
customer_reviews.author: mama1

customer_reviews.title: Thought size was larger
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set but seller should provide size details or notate that this is doll sized. I bought it for my granddaughter so we could have tea parties however the size is not what I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: kim deckard

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 5 year old niece who loves tea sets and ladybugs. Needless to say, she loved this set as well. She took such care unpacking it and inspecting all of the pieces. It's a beautiful set that I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it very much!! Delivery on time!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Schylling Ladybug Porcelain Tea Set Basket
product_meta.description:
Tea anyone? The Lady Bug Porcelain Tea Set from Schylling Toys, the world leader in traditional toys and classic fun, adds beauty and color to your tea party. Invite all your dolls, or your best friends, to join in as the hostess serves tea and goodies in the garden. This 13 piece set includes 1 tea pot with lid, 1 sugar bowl with lid, 1 creamer, 4 cups and 4 saucers. All of these pieces are beautifully adorned with beautiful Lady Bugs. For Ages 8+.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Ladybug Tea Set Basket
feature_bullets: Tea Anyone? The hostess it is throwing a tea party and inviting you…and lady bugs! They are so much fun
A 13 piece, elegant porcelain tea set beautifully decorated with cute and adorable lady bugs
Set includes 4 tea cups and saucers, a classic tea pot and lid, a sugar bowl with lid and a creamer
The tea cups stand 1.25 inches tall, the perfect size for a perfect and delightful tea party

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
